entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
